DOC.brief_summary: The purpose prospective multicenter cohort study examine long-term medical outcome , quality life , medical resource utilization elderly patient ( > = 65 year ) acute venous thromboembolism ( i.e. , acute pulmonary embolism and/or deep vein thrombosis )
DOC.criteria: Objectively confirm acute pulmonary embolism and/or deep vein thrombosis Age > =65 year Thrombosis different site lower limb Catheterrelated thrombosis Insufficient spoken language ability German French Followup possible ( e.g. , terminally ill patient ) Informed consent possible ( e.g. , severe dementia ) Prior enrolment study
